com.github.privacystreams.device

Class DeviceState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.privacystreams.core.Item
      • com.github.privacystreams.device.DeviceState

  • @PSItem
public class DeviceState
extends Item
    A DeviceEvent item represents a snapshot of device state.

    • Method Detail

      • asUpdates

        public static MStreamProvider asUpdates(long interval,
                                        int mask)
        Provide a live stream of device states, including bluetooth, wifi, battery level, and/or foreground apps etc.
        Parameters:
        interval - the interval between each two device state snapshots
        mask - the mask of device state type, could be `DeviceState.Masks.BLUETOOTH_DEVICE_LIST`, `DeviceState.Masks.WIFI_AP_LIST`, etc.
        Returns:
        the provider function
